name: Meet Me At The Corner
description:
Can you find my secrets?
My secret is, ...

Toby told Nina to meet him at the corner. Can Nina find Toby's secret?

W: up
S: down
A: left
D: right
R: reset
SPACE: action

Currently WIP for https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2020
Source Code: https://github.com/soasme/MeetMeAtTheCorner
